title: James Blood Ulmer - Black and Blues (1990) [FLAC]
description:
James Blood Ulmer - Black and Blues
Label: DIW-845 
Year of release: 1991
Genre: Jazz, Blues, Funk, Fusion

Recorded: 1990/10/24, 10/25, 11/06, 11/07 at The Power Station, NYC


Tracklist:

 1) Burning Like Love  	(Ulmer)               ( 5:54)
 2) Crying              	(Ulmer)               ( 6:12)
 3) Lady of Colours        	(Ulmer)               ( 5:38)
 4) Tower of Power        	(Ulmer)               ( 3:54)
 5) New York Day       	(M.Redfield/Ulmer)     ( 6:32)
 6) Make It Right         	(Ulmer)               ( 5:39)
 7) Sign Language         	(Ulmer)               ( 6:30)
 8) No Other Love        	(Ulmer)               ( 4:40)
 9) Uptown               	(Ulmer)               ( 6:02)


Lineup:
